---

</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/experiments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new experiment with variants, context and conditions. You can optionally specify metrics and experiment group for tracking and analysis.
